name: Cocola Egg & Chicken Masala Noodles
description:
Cocola Food Products Ltd. Protein, calcium, iodine, and vitamin-enriched egg noodles. Masala: Iodized salt, tasting salt, corn starch, chicken powder, sugar, egg powder, chili powder, tapioca starch, citric acid. Noodles are a type of food made from unleavened dough which is rolled flat and cut, stretched, or extruded, into long strips or strings. Noodles are usually cooked in boiling water, sometimes with cooking oil or salt added. They are also often pan-fried or deep-fried.

name: Nestle Maggi 2 Minute Masala Instant Noodles
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India. AGGI offers tasty and healthy snack options for Bangladeshi families Fortified with Vitamin A, Iron, and Iodine. The tastemaker is comprised of known ingredients typically found in Bangladeshi households, such as turmeric, pepper, coriander, ginger, and cardamom. To boost the goodness in your bowl, add colorful vegetables and lean protein such as chicken. Contains noodle cake & Tastemaker inside for a quick 2-minute preparation Variant: MasalaNet Weight: 992g

name: Mama Noodles (Hot And Spicy Flavour) 10 pcs
description:
Mama Noodles (Hot and Spicy Flavor) deliver a bold and exciting taste experience for those who crave a little heat! Each pack features flavorful noodles infused with a spicy seasoning blend that packs a punch, making it perfect for spice lovers. Ready in just minutes, these noodles are an ideal choice for a quick meal or snack anytime. Simply boil the noodles, add the seasoning, and enjoy a steaming bowl of deliciousness. You can also customize your dish by adding fresh vegetables, eggs, or your favorite protein for an extra kick. Packaged for freshness, Mama Noodles ensure that every bite is full of flavor and satisfaction. Dive into the fiery goodness of Mama Noodles (Hot and Spicy Flavor) and elevate your snacking game.

name: Cocola Chicken Masala Noodles
description:
Cocola Chicken Masala Noodles is a quick and delicious snack or meal option, enriched with protein and flavored with a blend of savory chicken masala. The noodles are easy to prepare and come with a seasoning packet to deliver an authentic and flavorful taste. Ingredients: The noodles are made from a blend of wheat flour, palm oil, salt, and various seasoning additives, including chicken powder, sugar, iodized salt, chili powder, corn starch, and egg powder​. Usage: Boil the noodles in water for 2-3 minutes. Add the included masala packet for seasoning. Can be garnished with vegetables, boiled eggs, or cooked chicken for a wholesome meal​.
Cocola Chicken Masala Noodles is a quick and delicious snack or meal option, enriched with protein and flavored with a blend of savory chicken masala. The noodles are easy to prepare and come with a seasoning packet to deliver an authentic and flavorful taste.
 
Ingredients: The noodles are made from a blend of wheat flour, palm oil, salt, and various seasoning additives, including chicken powder, sugar, iodized salt, chili powder, corn starch, and egg powder​.
 
Usage: Boil the noodles in water for 2-3 minutes. Add the included masala packet for seasoning. Can be garnished with vegetables, boiled eggs, or cooked chicken for a wholesome meal​.

name: Samyang Hot Chicken Ramen 3X Spicy
description:
Samyang Hot Chicken Ramen 3X Spicy (140g) is an intensely spicy instant noodle variety from South Korea. This version, known for its fiery heat, offers a rich blend of spicy chicken flavor, enhanced with soy sauce and savory broth. It's a non-vegetarian ramen, designed for those who crave extra spice in their meals.Ingredients: The ramen contains wheat flour, palm oil, seasoning powder (including chili, soy sauce, and chicken), and various flavor enhancers. It is non-vegetarian, so it's not suitable for vegetarians​.Use: Simply cook the noodles in boiling water for 5 minutes, drain, and then mix with the included spicy sauce for a truly fiery noodle experience.

name: Samyang Hot Chicken Ramen Noodles 2X Spicy
description:
Samyang 2x Spicy Hot Chicken Ramen Is Said To Be The Double Spicy Version Of The Original Hot Chicken Ramen Noodles. Alternatively Called Korean Fire Noodles, The Samyang Ramen Varieties Are Globally Known After They Were Given A Reference In The 'Korean Fire Noodles Challenge'.100% Halal.
